roleset.name: separate solids from liquid, sorting, sifting, isolating, diffusing
roleset.note: FILTER-V NOTES: Frames file for 'filter' based on sentences in wsj. Verbnet entry 10.4.2, better in 10.4.1. (from filter.02-v predicate notes)

example.name: all args
example.text: John filtered the bits of charcoal from Mary's attempt at chicken noodle soup.
example.arg: from Mary's attempt at chicken noodle soup

roleset.name: move slowly
roleset.note: FILTER-V NOTES: Frames file for 'filter' based on sentences in wsj. Verbnet entry 10.4.2, better in 10.4.1. (from filter.03-v predicate notes)

example.name: with direction
example.text: Perhaps the ethics of an industry's leader filters down and is one of the factors that ultimately shapes consumer trust in that industry.
example.arg: the ethics of an industry 's leader

example.name: with destination
example.text: Some U.S. products are filtering into the Soviet market under an emergency import program.
